title: CoPE: A Small Language Model for Steerable and Scalable Content Labeling
summary: This paper details the methodology behind CoPE, a policy-steerable small language model capable of fast and accurate content labeling. We present a novel training curricula called Contradictory Example Training that enables the model to learn policy interpretation rather than mere policy memorization.
